description: Reserved matters application seeking approval of appearance of DV7a and DV7b house type (now referred to as DV7e) on plots 181, 186, 203, 204, 205, 206, 207, 208, 209.  Details seeking approval include the internal layout and appearance of proposed roof spaces and introduction of velux windows.  This is pursuant to Condition 7 of the Hybrid planning permission reference B/00354/13 dated 01/10/2013 involving the erection of 163 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) comprising 84 houses and 79 apartments including associated infrastructure and reserved matters application for Phase 2 reference B/02349/14 dated 30/07/2014
site_name: Dollis Valley Estate, Including Former Barnet Hill School, 131-137 Mays LaneBarnetEN5 2DY
